mapper.select:
select
HOUR (u.register_time) AS `name`,
DATE(u.register_time) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(u.register_time, '%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(u.register_time, '%Y-%m') AS `name`,
count(*) as `value`, u.province as `group` from
user u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'SD_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'ZC_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` = 'SD_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` = 'ZC_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT o.`login_name` FROM user_role o WHERE o.`role` = 'AGENT' GROUP BY o.`login_name`) oo ON j.`login_name` = oo.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'NOT_STAFF_RECOMMEND' AND j.login_name = h.login_name)) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` in ('SD_STAFF', 'ZC_STAFF') UNION SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role IN ('SD_STAFF', 'ZC_STAFF', 'AGENT')) ff) gg WHERE gg.login_name = j.`login_name`)) u
where u.province = #{province}
where exists ( select province from ( select province from ( select count(*) as v, a.province from user a where a.register_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and exists (select * from bank_card b where a.login_name = b.login_name and b.status='PASSED')
and exists (select * from account ac where a.login_name = ac.login_name)
group by province ) t order by v desc limit 5 ) p where p.province = u.province )
and u.register_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and u.channel = #{channel}
and u.channel IS NULL
and exists (select * from bank_card b where u.login_name = b.login_name and b.status='PASSED')
and exists (select * from account ac where u.login_name = ac.login_name)
group by u.province,
HOUR (u.register_time)
date(u.register_time)
year(u.register_time), week(u.register_time)
year(u.register_time), month(u.register_time)
union all select
HOUR (u.register_time) AS `name`,
DATE(u.register_time) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(u.register_time, '%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(u.register_time, '%Y-%m') AS `name`,
count(*) as `value`, '其它' as `group` from
user u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'SD_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'ZC_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` = 'SD_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` = 'ZC_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT o.`login_name` FROM user_role o WHERE o.`role` = 'AGENT' GROUP BY o.`login_name`) oo ON j.`login_name` = oo.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'NOT_STAFF_RECOMMEND' AND j.login_name = h.login_name)) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` in ('SD_STAFF', 'ZC_STAFF') UNION SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role IN ('SD_STAFF', 'ZC_STAFF', 'AGENT')) ff) gg WHERE gg.login_name = j.`login_name`)) u
where not exists ( select province from ( select province from ( select count(*) as v, a.province from user a where a.register_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and exists (select * from bank_card b where a.login_name = b.login_name and b.status='PASSED')
and exists (select * from account ac where a.login_name = ac.login_name)
group by province ) t order by v desc limit 5 ) p where p.province = u.province ) and u.register_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and u.channel = #{channel}
and u.channel IS NULL
and exists (select * from bank_card b where u.login_name = b.login_name and b.status='PASSED')
and exists (select * from account ac where u.login_name = ac.login_name)
group by
HOUR (u.register_time)
date(u.register_time)
year(u.register_time), week(u.register_time)
year(u.register_time), month(u.register_time)

SELECT
HOUR (re.created_time) AS `name`,
DATE(re.`created_time`) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(re.`created_time`, '%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(re.`created_time`, '%Y-%m') AS `name`,
ROUND(SUM(re.amount / 100), 2) AS `value`, us.province AS `group` FROM `user` us JOIN `recharge` re ON us.login_name = re.login_name AND re.status = 'SUCCESS' AND re.created_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
JOIN (SELECT login_name FROM user_role WHERE role = #{role}) AS temp_role ON temp_role.login_name = us.login_name
JOIN (SELECT login_name, GROUP_CONCAT(role) AS role FROM user_role GROUP BY login_name) ur ON ur.login_name = us.login_name AND ur.role NOT LIKE '%LOANER%'
WHERE us.user_name IS NOT NULL
AND province = #{province}
-- 选择出充值金额最高的五个省份 AND province IN (SELECT `province` FROM (SELECT temp_user_1.province, ROUND(SUM(temp_re_1.amount / 100), 2) AS `temp_amount_1` FROM `user` AS temp_user_1 JOIN `recharge` temp_re_1 ON temp_user_1.login_name = temp_re_1.login_name AND temp_re_1.status = 'SUCCESS' AND temp_re_1.created_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
JOIN (SELECT login_name FROM user_role WHERE role = #{role}) AS temp_role_1 ON temp_role_1.login_name = temp_user_1.login_name
JOIN (SELECT login_name, GROUP_CONCAT(role) AS role FROM user_role GROUP BY login_name) ur ON ur.login_name = temp_user_1.login_name AND ur.role NOT LIKE '%LOANER%'
WHERE temp_user_1.user_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY temp_user_1.province ORDER BY `temp_amount_1` DESC LIMIT 5) AS temp_1)
GROUP BY `group`, `name`
-- 将充值金额最高的五个省份之外的省份统一合并成"其他" UNION ALL SELECT
HOUR (re.created_time) AS `name`,
DATE(re.`created_time`) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(re.`created_time`, '%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(re.`created_time`, '%Y-%m') AS `name`,
ROUND(SUM(re.amount / 100), 2) AS `value`, '其他' AS `group` FROM `user` us JOIN `recharge` re ON us.login_name = re.login_name AND re.status = 'SUCCESS' AND re.created_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
JOIN (SELECT login_name FROM user_role WHERE role = #{role}) AS temp_role ON temp_role.login_name = us.login_name
JOIN (SELECT login_name, GROUP_CONCAT(role) AS role FROM user_role GROUP BY login_name) ur ON ur.login_name = us.login_name AND ur.role NOT LIKE '%LOANER%'
WHERE us.user_name IS NOT NULL AND province NOT IN (SELECT `province` FROM (SELECT temp_user_2.province, ROUND(SUM(temp_re_2.amount / 100), 2) AS `temp_amount_2` FROM `user` AS temp_user_2 JOIN `recharge` temp_re_2 ON temp_user_2.login_name = temp_re_2.login_name AND temp_re_2.status = 'SUCCESS' AND temp_re_2.created_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
JOIN (SELECT login_name FROM user_role WHERE role = #{role}) AS temp_role_2 ON temp_role_2.login_name = temp_user_2.login_name
JOIN (SELECT login_name, GROUP_CONCAT(role) AS role FROM user_role GROUP BY login_name) ur ON ur.login_name = temp_user_2.login_name AND ur.role NOT LIKE '%LOANER%'
WHERE temp_user_2.user_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY temp_user_2.province ORDER BY `temp_amount_2` DESC LIMIT 5) AS temp_2) GROUP BY `group`, `name`

SELECT
HOUR (w.created_time) AS `name`,
DATE(w.`created_time`) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(w.`created_time`, '%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(w.`created_time`, '%Y-%m') AS `name`,
ROUND(SUM(w.amount / 100), 2) AS `value`, us.province AS `group` FROM `user` us JOIN `withdraw` w ON us.login_name = w.login_name AND w.status = 'SUCCESS' AND w.created_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
JOIN (SELECT login_name FROM user_role WHERE role = #{role}) AS temp_role ON temp_role.login_name = us.login_name
JOIN (SELECT login_name, GROUP_CONCAT(role) AS role FROM user_role GROUP BY login_name) ur ON ur.login_name = us.login_name AND ur.role NOT LIKE '%LOANER%'
WHERE us.user_name IS NOT NULL
AND province = #{province}
-- 选择出提现金额最高的五个省份 AND province IN (SELECT `province` FROM (SELECT temp_user_1.province, ROUND(SUM(temp_w_1.amount / 100), 2) AS `temp_amount_1` FROM `user` AS temp_user_1 JOIN `withdraw` temp_w_1 ON temp_user_1.login_name = temp_w_1.login_name AND temp_w_1.status = 'SUCCESS' AND temp_w_1.created_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
JOIN (SELECT login_name FROM user_role WHERE role = #{role}) AS temp_role_1 ON temp_role_1.login_name = temp_user_1.login_name
JOIN (SELECT login_name, GROUP_CONCAT(role) AS role FROM user_role GROUP BY login_name) ur ON ur.login_name = temp_user_1.login_name AND ur.role NOT LIKE '%LOANER%'
WHERE temp_user_1.user_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY temp_user_1.province ORDER BY `temp_amount_1` DESC LIMIT 5) AS temp_1)
GROUP BY `group`, `name`
-- 将提现金额最高的五个省份之外的省份统一合并成"其他" UNION ALL SELECT
HOUR (w.created_time) AS `name`,
DATE(w.`created_time`) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(w.`created_time`, '%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(w.`created_time`, '%Y-%m') AS `name`,
ROUND(SUM(w.amount / 100), 2) AS `value`, '其他' AS `group` FROM `user` us JOIN `withdraw` w ON us.login_name = w.login_name AND w.status = 'SUCCESS' AND w.created_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
JOIN (SELECT login_name FROM user_role WHERE role = #{role}) AS temp_role ON temp_role.login_name = us.login_name
JOIN (SELECT login_name, GROUP_CONCAT(role) AS role FROM user_role GROUP BY login_name) ur ON ur.login_name = us.login_name AND ur.role NOT LIKE '%LOANER%'
WHERE us.user_name IS NOT NULL AND province NOT IN (SELECT `province` FROM (SELECT temp_user_2.province, ROUND(SUM(temp_w_2.amount / 100), 2) AS `temp_amount_2` FROM `user` AS temp_user_2 JOIN `withdraw` temp_w_2 ON temp_user_2.login_name = temp_w_2.login_name AND temp_w_2.status = 'SUCCESS' AND temp_w_2.created_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
JOIN (SELECT login_name FROM user_role WHERE role = #{role}) AS temp_role_2 ON temp_role_2.login_name = temp_user_2.login_name
JOIN (SELECT login_name, GROUP_CONCAT(role) AS role FROM user_role GROUP BY login_name) ur ON ur.login_name = temp_user_2.login_name AND ur.role NOT LIKE '%LOANER%'
WHERE temp_user_2.user_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY temp_user_2.province ORDER BY `temp_amount_2` DESC LIMIT 5) AS temp_2) GROUP BY `group`, `name`

select DATE_FORMAT(i.`created_time`,'%H') AS `name`, count(1) as `value`, u.province as `group` from user u join invest i on u.login_name = i.login_name
where u.province = #{province}
where exists ( select 1 from ( select uu.province from invest ii join user uu on uu.login_name=ii.login_name where ii.status='SUCCESS' and ii.created_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and transfer_invest_id is not NULL
and transfer_invest_id is NULL
group by uu.province order by count(ii.id) desc limit 5 ) temp where temp.province=u.province )
and i.status='SUCCESS' and i.created_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and transfer_invest_id is not NULL
and transfer_invest_id is NULL
group by u.province, `name`
union all select DATE_FORMAT(i.`created_time`,'%H') AS `name`, count(1) as `value`, '其它' as `group` from user u join invest i on u.login_name = i.login_name where not exists ( select 1 from ( select uu.province from invest ii join user uu on uu.login_name=ii.login_name where ii.status='SUCCESS' and ii.created_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by uu.province order by count(ii.id) desc limit 5 ) temp where temp.province=u.province ) and i.status='SUCCESS' and i.created_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and transfer_invest_id is not NULL
and transfer_invest_id is NULL
group by `name`

select
DATE(i.created_time) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(i.created_time,'%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(i.created_time,'%Y-%m') AS `name`,
ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(i.amount), 0)/100, 2) as `value`, u.province as `group` from
user u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'SD_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'ZC_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` = 'SD_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` = 'ZC_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT o.`login_name` FROM user_role o WHERE o.`role` = 'AGENT' GROUP BY o.`login_name`) oo ON j.`login_name` = oo.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'NOT_STAFF_RECOMMEND' AND j.login_name = h.login_name)) u
join invest i on u.login_name = i.login_name
where u.province = #{province}
where exists ( select 1 from ( select uu.province as province, IFNULL(SUM(ii.amount), 0) as amount from invest ii join
user uu
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'SD_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'ZC_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` = 'SD_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` = 'ZC_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT o.`login_name` FROM user_role o WHERE o.`role` = 'AGENT' GROUP BY o.`login_name`) oo ON j.`login_name` = oo.login_name) uu
(SELECT j.* FROM user j WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'NOT_STAFF_RECOMMEND' AND j.login_name = h.login_name)) uu
on uu.login_name=ii.login_name where ii.status='SUCCESS' and ii.loan_id > 1 and ii.created_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by province order by amount desc limit 5 ) temp where temp.province=u.province )
and i.status='SUCCESS' and i.loan_id > 1 and i.created_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and u.channel = #{channel}
and u.channel IS NULL
and transfer_invest_id is not NULL
and transfer_invest_id is NULL
group by u.province, `name`
union all select
DATE(i.created_time) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(i.created_time,'%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(i.created_time,'%Y-%m') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(i.`created_time`,'%H') AS `name`,
ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(i.amount), 0)/100, 2) as `value`, '其它' as `group` from
user u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'SD_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'ZC_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` = 'SD_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` = 'ZC_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT o.`login_name` FROM user_role o WHERE o.`role` = 'AGENT' GROUP BY o.`login_name`) oo ON j.`login_name` = oo.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'NOT_STAFF_RECOMMEND' AND j.login_name = h.login_name)) u
join invest i on u.login_name = i.login_name where not exists ( select 1 from ( select uu.province as province, IFNULL(SUM(ii.amount), 0) as amount from invest ii join
user uu
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'SD_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT h.login_name FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'ZC_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` = 'SD_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT k.`login_name` FROM user_role o RIGHT JOIN referrer_relation k ON o.`login_name` = k.`referrer_login_name` AND k.`level` = 1 WHERE o.`role` = 'ZC_STAFF') gg ON j.`login_name` = gg.login_name) u
(SELECT j.* FROM user j JOIN (SELECT o.`login_name` FROM user_role o WHERE o.`role` = 'AGENT' GROUP BY o.`login_name`) oo ON j.`login_name` = oo.login_name) uu
(SELECT j.* FROM user j WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM user_role h WHERE h.role = 'NOT_STAFF_RECOMMEND' AND j.login_name = h.login_name)) uu
on uu.login_name=ii.login_name where ii.status='SUCCESS' and ii.loan_id > 1 and ii.created_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and transfer_invest_id is not NULL
and transfer_invest_id is NULL
group by province order by amount desc limit 5 ) temp where temp.province=u.province ) and i.status='SUCCESS' and i.loan_id > 1 and i.created_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and u.channel = #{channel}
and u.channel IS NULL
and transfer_invest_id is not NULL
and transfer_invest_id is NULL
group by `name`

SELECT loan.periods AS `name`, ROUND(SUM(invest.amount / 100), 2) AS `value` FROM loan JOIN invest ON loan.id = invest.loan_id AND invest.`status` = 'SUCCESS' AND invest.`transfer_invest_id` IS NULL AND invest.`invest_time` BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime} WHERE loan.`status` IN ( 'RAISING', 'RECHECK', 'REPAYING', 'COMPLETE', 'OVERDUE' ) AND loan.`product_type` != 'EXPERIENCE' GROUP BY loan.periods ORDER BY `name` ;

select periods as `name`, GROUP_CONCAT(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,fundraising_start_time,raising_complete_time) ORDER BY TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,fundraising_start_time,raising_complete_time) ASC) as `value`, ROUND(SUM(TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR,fundraising_start_time,raising_complete_time))/COUNT(1),0) as `group` from loan where fundraising_start_time is not null AND raising_complete_time is not null AND created_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by periods order by `name` asc

select
DATE(created_time) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m') AS `name`,
count(distinct(`withdraw`.login_name)) AS `value`, '提现人数' AS `group`
from withdraw
join (select login_name from `user_role` where role = #{role}) temp_role on temp_role.login_name = `withdraw`.login_name
JOIN (SELECT login_name, GROUP_CONCAT(role) AS role FROM user_role GROUP BY login_name) ur ON ur.login_name = withdraw.login_name AND ur.role NOT LIKE '%LOANER%'
where status = 'SUCCESS'
and created_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
group by
date(created_time)
year(created_time), week(created_time)
year(created_time), month(created_time)

SELECT ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(r.corpus + r.expected_interest + r.default_interest),0)/ 100, 2) AS `value`, DATE(DATE_ADD(#{repayDate},INTERVAL -1 DAY)) AS `name`, '待收' as `group` FROM loan l LEFT JOIN loan_repay r ON l.id = r.loan_id WHERE l.status IN ('REPAYING' , 'COMPLETE', 'OVERDUE') AND l.recheck_time < #{repayDate} AND (r.actual_repay_date > #{repayDate} or actual_repay_date is null)

SELECT
DATE(created_time) AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-W%u') AS `name`,
DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m') AS `name`,
ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(amount), 0)/ 100, 2) AS `value`, '支出' as `group` FROM system_bill WHERE operation_type = 'OUT'
and created_time >= #{startTime}
and created_time <= #{endTime}
GROUP BY
date(created_time)
year(created_time), week(created_time)
year(created_time), month(created_time)
ORDER BY created_time

SELECT COUNT(login_name) AS `value`, CASE WHEN contract_no = 'OLD' THEN '老用户' WHEN contract_no = '' OR contract_no IS NULL THEN '已投资未生成合同' ELSE '已投资且生成合同' END AS `name` FROM invest WHERE invest.`status` = 'SUCCESS' AND EXISTS (SELECT id FROM loan WHERE invest.loan_id = loan.id AND loan.product_type != 'EXPERIENCE') GROUP BY `name`
